::Havotron/Darkwing::
He rounds corner and stops turning to Darkwing.  
"You stay right here, listen to what the council has to say to 
Soundwave, then report back to me. Spinister, we will talk in this 
room here" he said walking into a new room.

Darkwing salutes then stands where directed listening to the council, 
hidden around a dark corner.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister follows, his feet not making a noise as he takes each 
step,
> carefull, and calculating.
> 
> The council turns, "Soundwave, a word with you."
